properties.class: Warrior, Elven Knight, Palus Knight, Monk

steps.text: Talk to Duelist Kaien in Warrior Guild in the Town of Oren.

Follow the orders of Duelist Kaien: Go to the Wasteland, hunt Puncher, collect Puncher's Shard  — 10 pcs. Go to Ant Nest, hunt Noble Ant Captain, collect Noble Ant's Feeler  — 10 pcs. Go to the Cruma Marshlands, hunt Marsh Stakato Drone, collect Drone's Chitin  — 10 pcs. Go to the Execution Grounds, hunt Corpse Tracker, until you have Corpse Tracker Fang  — 10 pcs. Go to Breka's Stronghold, hunt Breka Orc Prefect, collect Prefect's Necklace  — 10 pcs. Go to the Death Pass, kill Fettered Soul and collect Fettered Soul's Chain  — 10 pcs. Go to Hunters Valley, hunt Tamlin Orc to collect Tamlin Orc's Ring  — 10 pcs., Tamlin Orc Archer, collect Tamlin Orc's Arrow  — 10 pcs. Go to Ivory Tower Crater, hunt Reinforced Monster Eye, collect Reinforced Monster Eye Meat  — 10 pcs. Go to the Plains of the Lizardmen, hunt Leto Lizardman Overlord, collect Chief's Amulet  — 10 pcs.
Talk to Duelist Kaien in Warrior Guild in the Town of Oren.

Follow the last order: Go to Cruma Tower, on the third floor hunt Krator, collect Krator's Shard  — 3 pcs., and Excuro, collect Excuro's Skin  — 3 pcs. Go to the Death Pass, kill Grandis and collect Grandis' Skin  — 3 pcs. Go to Hunters Valley, kill Lakin and collect Lakin's Mace  — 3 pcs. Go to Timak Outpost, hunt Timak Orc Prefect, until you have Timak Orc's Belt  — 3 pcs.
Talk to Duelist Kaien in Warrior Guild in the Town of Oren and get the reward.
